Reviews.Title: “Convient to get from Sahiba to Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Paul F
Reviews.Content: We were getting in to Sahiba late and didn't want to deal with getting to Istanbul at night so we decided to stay near the airport. It was a little farther away than I had anticipated (a 32TL Cab ride, 14km). The room was nice and the front desk was helpful, but although the nice I heard the rumble of a train. The next morning I asked if that was a commuter line. Turns out hotel is right on a commuter line. A 10TL cab ride will get you to Pendik station, or if you are traveling light and don't mind off roading it, there is a station a 200m walk from hotel. From Pendik, 2TL will get you to a ferry, 2 more will get you to Enimou and 2 more for the tram will get you to Sultanahmet (6TL total and about 1.5 hr). Avoid using Taxis to get to next hotel, as they will rip you off.

Reviews.Title: “Cool place to stay”
Reviews.Author: thomas198129
Reviews.Content: The Mamara Pendik Hotel is a nice little Hotel,people are very friendly and they always try to help you. The Rooms are clean and well equipped,you will find in your room a little kitchen including a dishwasher,fridge,sink and so on. Also u will find a washing mashine in your room,which is perfect if you stay long term. All rooms have perfect high speed Internet available with NO extra charge.Room Cleaning will be done every day. Many Restaurants and Bars are in Walking Distance ( 700m),also you will find shopping MallÂ´s ( 1,5 km) Every Saturday the big Bazar is open,you should see that.Just 300 metrs away. In the end i have to say, the Mamara Pendik is a cool place to stay,especially if you stay long term.
